name: trackedRaycast(from:allowing:alignment:updateHandler:)
desc: Performs a tracked ray cast, where a ray is cast into the scene from the center of the camera through a point in the view.
declaration: @MainActor func trackedRaycast(from point: CGPoint, allowing target: ARRaycastQuery.Target, alignment: ARRaycastQuery.TargetAlignment, updateHandler: @escaping ([ARRaycastResult]) -> Void) -> ARTrackedRaycast?
